verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הָרְבִיעִ֔ת <WH7243> And it came to pass in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> came הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> [that] this word הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַח־ <WH3947> Take לְךָ֮ מְגִלַּת־ <WH4039> thee a roll סֵפֶר֒ <WH5612> of a book וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <WH3789> and write אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> about אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֞ים <WH1697> therein all the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבַּ֧רְתִּי <WH1696> that I have spoken אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> to you עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> unto thee against Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> and concerning יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and against Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and concerning כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> and against all the nations מִיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> from the day דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> I spake אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to you מִימֵ֣י <WH3117> unto thee from the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֔הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אוּלַ֤י <WH194> Perhaps יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> will hear בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> It may be that the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> which I purpose לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do לָהֶ֑ם לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> order יָשׁ֗וּבוּ <WH7725> unto them that they may return אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> from his evil וְסָלַחְתִּ֥י <WH5545> that I may forgive לַעֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> their iniquity וּלְחַטָּאתָֽם׃ <WH2403> and their sin ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah אֶת־ <WH853> בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1263> Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵֽרִיָּ֑ה <WH5374> of Neriah וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> wrote בָּר֜וּךְ <WH1263> and Baruch מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> from the mouth יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> which he had spoken אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about עַל־ <WH5921> upon מְגִלַּת־ <WH4039> unto him upon a roll סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> of a book

וַיְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> And Jeremiah אֶת־ <WH853> בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1263> Baruch לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am עָצ֔וּר <WH6113> I [am] shut up לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֔ל <WH3201> I cannot לָב֖וֹא <WH935> go בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וּבָאתָ֣ <WH935> Therefore go אַתָּ֡ה <WH859> you וְקָרָ֣אתָ <WH7121> thou and read בַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <WH4039> in the roll אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which כָּתַֽבְתָּ־ <WH3789> which thou hast written מִפִּי֩ <WH6310> from my mouth אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> the words יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> in the ears הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> of the people בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> in the LORD'S בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day צ֑וֹם <WH6685> upon the fasting וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> and also בְּאָזְנֵ֧י <WH241> them in the ears כָל־ <WH3605> to all יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of all Judah הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> that come out מֵעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> of their cities תִּקְרָאֵֽם׃ <WH7121> and also thou shalt read

אוּלַ֞י <WH194> Perhaps תִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> It may be they will present תְּחִנָּתָם֙ <WH8467> their supplication לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <WH7725> and will return אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> from his evil כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָד֤וֹל <WH1419> for great הָאַף֙ <WH639> [is] the anger וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> and the fury אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath pronounced יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> against הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> against this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <WH6213> did בָּרוּךְ֙ <WH1263> And Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֣רִיָּ֔ה <WH5374> of Neriah כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> commanded יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> according to all that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> him reading בַסֵּ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house יְהֹוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD'S ס

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become בַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַ֠חֲמִשִׁית <WH2549> And it came to pass in the fifth לִיהוֹיָקִ֨ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֤הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <WH8671> in the ninth קָרְא֨וּ <WH7121> [that] they proclaimed צ֜וֹם <WH6685> a fast לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> to all the people בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> and to all the people הַבָּאִ֛ים <WH935> that came מֵעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> from the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> Then read בָר֥וּךְ <WH1263> Baruch בַּסֵּ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּלִשְׁכַּ֡ת <WH3957> in the chamber גְּמַרְיָהוּ֩ <WH1587> of Gemariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֨ן <WH8227> of Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֜ר <WH5608> the scribe בֶּחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הָעֶלְי֗וֹן <WH5945> in the higher פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> at the entry שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD'S הֶֽחָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> of the new בְּאָזְנֵ֖י <WH241> in the ears כָּל־ <WH3605> to all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of all the people

וַ֠יִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> had heard מִכָ֨יְהוּ <WH4321> When Michaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גְּמַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH1587> of Gemariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <WH8227> of Shaphan אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> all the words יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הַסֵּֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> out of the book

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> Then he went down בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> into the king's עַל־ <WH5921> and לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <WH3957> chamber הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> into the scribe's וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> and lo all the princes יֽוֹשְׁבִ֑ים <WH3427> sat אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <WH476> there [even] Elishama הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <WH5608> the scribe וּדְלָיָ֣הוּ <WH1806> and Delaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁ֠מַעְיָהוּ <WH8098> of Shemaiah וְאֶלְנָתָ֨ן <WH494> and Elnathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַכְבּ֜וֹר <WH5907> of Achbor וּגְמַרְיָ֧הוּ <WH1587> and Gemariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <WH8227> of Shaphan וְצִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH6667> and Zedekiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חֲנַנְיָ֖הוּ <WH2608> of Hananiah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַשָּׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> and all the princes

וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> declared לָהֶם֙ מִכָ֔יְהוּ <WH4321> Then Michaiah אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> unto them all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he שָׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> that he had heard בִּקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> read בָר֛וּךְ <WH1263> when Baruch בַּסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> the book בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> in the ears הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> sent כָל־ <WH3605> all הַשָּׂרִ֜ים <WH8269> Therefore all the princes אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֗וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדִ֡י <WH3065> Jehudi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְ֠תַנְיָהוּ <WH5418> of Nethaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֶׁלֶמְיָ֣הוּ <WH8018> of Shelemiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son כּוּשִׁי֮ <WH3570> of Cushi לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying הַמְּגִלָּ֗ה <WH4039> the roll אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which קָרָ֤אתָ <WH7121> wherein thou hast read בָּהּ֙ בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the ears הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people קָחֶ֥נָּה <WH3947> Take בְיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> in thine hand וָלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> and come וַ֠יִּקַּח <WH3947> took בָּר֨וּךְ <WH1263> So Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵרִיָּ֤הוּ <WH5374> of Neriah אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּגִלָּה֙ <WH4039> the roll בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him שֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> unto him Sit down נָ֔א <WH4994> please וּקְרָאֶ֖נָּה <WH7121> now and read בְּאָזְנֵ֑ינוּ <WH241> it in our ears וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> read בָר֖וּךְ <WH1263> So Baruch בְּאָזְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH241> [it] in their ears

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּשָׁמְעָם֙ <WH8085> Now it came to pass when they had heard אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> all the words פָּחֲד֖וּ <WH6342> they were afraid אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> both רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> and other וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch הַגֵּ֤יד <WH5046> We will surely נַגִּיד֙ <WH5046> tell לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> of all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1263> Baruch שָׁאֲל֖וּ <WH7592> And they asked לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַגֶּד־ <WH5046> Tell נָ֣א <WH4994> please לָ֔נוּ אֵ֗יךְ <WH349> how כָּתַ֛בְתָּ <WH3789> us now How didst thou write אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִפִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> according

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> answered לָהֶם֙ בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1263> Then Baruch מִפִּיו֙ <WH6310> unto me with his mouth יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> them He pronounced אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַאֲנִ֛י <WH589> I כֹּתֵ֥ב <WH3789> and I wrote עַל־ <WH5921> on הַסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the book בַּדְּיֽוֹ׃ <WH1773> [them] with ink פ

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> Then said הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> the princes אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go הִסָּתֵ֖ר <WH5641> hide אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וְיִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> thee thou and Jeremiah וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and let no man אַל־ <WH408> not יֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> know אֵיפֹ֥ה <WH375> where אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> you
